txt.en: Mapping points can be found in 'Sagroth, Lair of Vermin.'\n\nYou should find them to complete the map of the sewers.
'If it were not for this map, I fear Lágsaith would have never found her way out of those sewers!\n\n'I jest, of course.'
Use the Instance Finder to enter 'Sagroth, Lair of Vermin' on any difficulty.
Talk to Aighrig in Bail Avarc
Enter 'Sagroth, Lair of Vermin' on any difficulty
Thanks to Aighrig's map, Lágsaith's tale became a little less confusing to follow.\n\nYou should return the map to Aighrig in Bail Avarc.
The layout of Carn Dûm's sewers is a mess. Aighrig's map is a work-in-progress, but it might also help you visualize Lágsaith's story better.

'After our adventures in the east, it is strange to see you here in my homeland, [placeholder]. But you are a welcome sight.'

Lukhag chirps in affirmation.

'I am sure Lágsaith wishes to regale you with the tale of our expedition, so I will not keep you for long. But perhaps knowledge of the sewers' layout will allow you to appreciate her retelling more.' She hands you a map that has been sketched in a careful hand. 'I traced our steps while we were down there. Lágsaith would never admit this, but she needed the help; her sense of direction is atrocious.

'You may borrow the map until Lágsaith is finished with her retelling.'


<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: To advance this quest, you must use the Instance Finder (Ctrl+J) to enter Sagroth, Lair of Vermin.</rgb>

'I trust that the map helped? It is rudimentary to be sure, but useful as well. Without it, we may have been lost forever.' A small smile cracks through Aighrig's serious countenance. 'I jest. But returning home would have been more difficult.\n\n'The map only displays a fraction of the full sewer system. It is my hope that we will complete it on future expeditions. There is still much work to be done, after all.'
